Interface GameMode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TreasureChase

    public interface GameMode
    Represents a game mode in the Labyrinth game. The two game modes planned are Treasure Chase and Word Chase. At the moment only Treasure Chase is being implemented
    Version:
    0.1.07032013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle

    • Method Summary

      • moveToken

        void moveToken(int row,
             int column)
        Move the token to a particular tile
        Parameters:

        column - The column coordinate of the tile

      • moveTile

        void moveTile(int currRow,
            int currColumn,
            int newRow,
            int newColumn)
        Move an existing tile on the board to a new location
        Parameters:
        currRow - The current row coordinate of the tile
        currColumn - The current column coordinate of the tile
        newRow - The new row coordinate of the tile
        newColumn - The new column coordinate of the tile

      • rotateTile

        void rotateTile(int angle)
        Rotate the spare tile to a particular rotation
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle to rotate the spare tile by

      • rotateTile

        void rotateTile(int row,
              int column,
              int angle)
        Rotate the tile specified to a particular rotation
        Parameters:
        row - The row coordinate of the existing tile
        column - The column coordinate of the existing tile
        angle - The angle to rotate the tile by

      • replaceTile

        void replaceTile(int row,
               int column)
        Replace an existing tile on the board with the Player's spare tile
        Parameters:
        row - The row coordinate of the existing tile
        column - The column coordinate of the existing tile

      • replaceTile

        void replaceTile(int row,
               int column,
               Tile newTile)
        Replace an existing tile on the board with a new tile
        Parameters:
        row - The row coordinate of the existing tile
        column - The column coordinate of the existing tile
        newTile - The new tile to place over an existing tile
